h1_title: How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor
h2_title: How to Unlock Zodiac Village in The Painted Realm
content: To progress Loong's questline, you'll need to go back to Xu Dog. If you've been following our Walkthrough, by the time you reach Chapter 3, Xu Dog will have moved to the Cellar underneath the Crouching Tiger Temple in Yellow Wind Ridge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Zodiac_Village_and_Upgrade_Armor.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor', specifically from the subsection 'How to Unlock Zodiac Village in The Painted Realm'.
The content is as follows:
To progress Loong's questline, you'll need to go back to Xu Dog. If you've been following our Walkthrough, by the time you reach Chapter 3, Xu Dog will have moved to the Cellar underneath the Crouching Tiger Temple in Yellow Wind Ridge.
